title: Thayers - Rose Petal Witch Hazel with Aloe Vera Alcohol-Free Toner - 12 oz.
description: Thayers Witch Hazel with Aloe Vera Rose Petal With ALOE VERA Formula Gentle Moisturizes Vitamin E Alcohol-Free Rose Petal Witch Hazel Toner With Certified Organic Witch hazel and Aloe Vera Formula Over 120 years ago Rose Thayer niece of Henry Thayer MD developed an all-natural recipe for extra-soft youthful-looking skin As she aged many would comment on how she always looked 10 years younger than she was Now for the first time her secret formula of Rose Petal water blended with Witch Hazel extract Certified Organic Aloe Vera and Vitamin E is being made available Witch Hazel helps to tighten pores and to smooth and beautify skin without drying THAYERS proprietary Certified Organic Witch Hazel (derived from the bark) is not distilled thereby maintaining all the beneficial natural tannins Assay of hamamelitannin shows that Witch Hazel bark extract is 31 times richer in hamamelitannin than the leaf extract and 87 times richer than the stem extract (Resource: Vennat B "Tannins from Hamamelis virginana " Plant Medica 54(1988):454-457) "Rose's secret to looking 10 years younger naturally" Alcohol-Free Paraben-Free Propylene Glycol-Free Un-Distilled Witch Hazel (with all the beneficial natural tannins) Moisturizes Cleanses Free Of Alcohol Disclaimer These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA These products are not intended to diagnose treat cure or prevent any disease Thayers Witch Hazel with Aloe Vera Rose Petal Directions Apply with a cotton ball or soft pad to cleanse soften refresh and moisturize skin Use anytime throughout the day as a softening refresherIngredients: Purified water aloe barbadensis leaf (certified organic filet of aloe vera) glycerin (vegetable) fragrance (natural rose) hamamelis virginiana (THAYERS proprietary un-distilled certified organic witch hazel) extract rosa centifolia (rose) flower water citric acid citrus grandis

title: Black & Tan 75x Indoor Tanning Bed Bronzer 13.5OZ
description: Auto-darkening tan technology delivers extreme bronze tanning results through its luxurious silicone emulsion and now energizing warming beads. Achieve dark color like never before and ultra moisturization that lasts all day.

title: Moisturizer-Daily Essential Jojoba/Aloe Desert Essence 4 oz Cream
description: Moisturizer-Daily Essential Jojoba Aloe by Desert Essence 4 oz Cream Re-hydrates skin with regular use Restores skins softness Soothes and helps nourish day or night The essential oil of flowering geraniums adds a soft natural fragrance to this daily moisturizer fortified with jojoba oil and aloe vera to soothe restore and maintain the soft feel you love in your skin.

title: Toner Lavender Witch Hazel Alcohol-Free Thayer 12 oz Liquid
description: Toner Lavender Witch Hazel Alcohol-Free by Thayer 12 oz Liquid Toner Lavender Witch Hazel Alcohol-Free 12 oz Liquid Product Our new Lavender Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel with Aloe Vera Formula Toner and Vitamin E revitalizes the skin with a gentle soothing formula. Go ahead treat yourself. Ingredients Purified Water Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Certified Organic Filet Of Aloe Vera) Glycerin (Vegetable) Fragrance (Natural Lavender) Hamamelis Virginiana (THAYERS proprietary un-distilled Witch Hazel) Extract Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water Citric Acid Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate. Warnings Keep out of reach of children. As with all dietary supplements consult your healthcare professional before use. See product label for more information.

title: DESERT ESSENCE Gentle Stimulating Facial Scrub 4 OZ
description: Gently removes dead skin cells Stimulates skin for a rosy, fresh complexion Helps unclog pores for improved skin health Natural exfoliators jojoba seed, almond, and oat are formulated together to gently buff your skin and leave it fresh, clean, and reinvigorated. Aloe vera and cucumber extracts also help to soothe, giving your complexion a smooth radiance you can see and feel.

title: Desert Essence Thoroughly Clean Face Wash, 8-Ounce  Bottle
description: The extract of Hawaii's fragrant awapuhi plant brings additional softening properties to this gentle, but effective cleanser already rich in soothing extract of goldenseal and essential oil of chamomile. Eco-Harvest Tea Tree Oil leaves a clean that feels oil-free, and with regular use, helps improve your skin's texture and radiance.

title: Goody StayPut Elastics, Black 20 ea
description: These pony holders are infused with silde - proof technology to provide a secure hold without sacrificing style.

title: Revlon Rvdr5029 1875 Watt Smoothstay Ceramic Ionic Dryer, Purple
description: Our Smoothstay 1875 Watt Dryer provides smooth results, extreme shine and fast drying. Dryers comes with Ceramic & Ionic Technologies, 3 Heat / 2 Speed Settings, Cold Shot Button to set the style.
